relation: windows that are moved to another desktop should be treated as sticky windows (bug #213847)
Medium focus stealing prevention should also prevent focus stealing when the timestamp on the active window is uncertain (bug #304746)
KWin keybindings is missing a shortcut for move window to previous screen (bug #303083)
There should be a shortcut to close window group (bug #238233)
JJ: Use a bit of Wobbly effect while closing a window also. (bug #250856)
Highlight/shadow of application on screen 1 displayed on screen 0 (bug #278697)
Allow Effects to Temporarily Grab All Screen Edges (bug #283397)
Translucency Effect needs to be rewritten on top of AnimationEffect (bug #294856)
Break NETWM to allow inner xinerama struts (bug #299247)
Make ShaderManager act as a real stack (bug #300349)
Display content of resizing/moving windows: KDE-Help shows obsolete instructions (bug #305297)
Broken Desktop Switch On-Screen Display Animation (bug #316372)
Windows with no border (decoration) are visible on all activities (bug #274931)
"Thumbnail Aside" effect visible when screen is locked -- privacy issue (bug #255712, Review 108670)
Quick Tile shortcuts should be toggle buttons (bug #263755)
Shaded windows are not considered in ::checkWorkspacePosition (bug #268660, Review 109679)
Window Specific Settings for Disabling Screen Edges (bug #271607, Review 108513)
Add fade in/fade out for outline effect (bug #274474)
Compositing not possible on each screen with multi head (bug #282677, Review 107853)
Remove "Move TBLR" from Zoom or at least pass the shortcuts reasonable names (bug #288903, Review 108290)
Hot Screen Corners do not work properly in multiscreen setup with different resolutions (bug #290887, Review 108513)
When "dim inactive" is used, and "apply effect to groups" is disabled, blocky shadows appear everywhere (bug #293236)
kwin does not honor disableMultihead true and causes window focus problems (bug #293734)
Walk Through Desktop layout rendering desktop previews (bug #296069)
Move ThumbnailBar from BoxSwitch to CoverSwitch (bug #296070)
Fix fullscreen state handling: NETWM says it's bound to focus and not stacking order, also see bug #224600 (bug #296076, Review 109572)
New Window Decoration for Thin Clients (bug #299143)
Get rid of "Display borders on maximized windows" setting (bug #299245)
Cube animation on border approach should not be used unless the electric borders are actually in use and the config should be disabled, align or hint the electric border configuration (bug #299901)
clientPopup: "'More actions' and "Attach as tab to" lack mnemonics (bug #302833, Review 110402)
Maximized windows should be moved and maximized to second screen if they are moved with shortcut (bug #304506)
Window shortcut containing space: "Launch Mail" doesn't work (bug #305434)
Windows list icon does not show up in "Walk Through Desktop List" (bug #306187, Review 108445)
The "walk through desktop" shortcuts don't show up in the desktop kcm (bug #306404, Review 108287)
Usability issue: "Attach as tab to" menu can be empty (bug #306451)
Upper part of windows tears when moving it left/right ONLY in upper part of display (bug #307965)
KWin uses getdomainname() to obtain the hostname, should use getaddrinfo() (bug #308391, Review 108235)
Use Resize Area in Aurorae (bug #308992, Review 107936)
Configurable quick tile area config GUI (bug #308993, Review 109683)
Crash in KWin::Screenedge::unreserve on deactivating Actos script (bug #309695, Review 108513)
[JJ] GHNS button displays icon, even if disabled in style settings (bug #309724, Review 108286)
ScreenEdge::raisePanelProxies() is slow due to sync XLib communication (bug #311592, Review 108513)
add rule to disobey configure requests (bug #311720, Review 109691)
Windows wider/taller than screen are cut off/partially mirrored when doing a screenshot of them using ksnapshot (bug #312851, Review 108258)
Desktop Effects - Zoom: Mouse Tracking "Push" laggy, inprecise and/or not working (bug #312956)
"Login" effect does not fade in on secondary monitor(s) with a multi screen setup (bug #313061, Review 108362)
Overlap factor of keepAbove windows in placeSmart should be infinite (bug #313379)
XReconfigureWMWindow fails to stack (lower) a window using an Above CWSibling combination (bug #313909)
Position rule conflicts with maximization rule (bug #314392)
String representation of KWin::Client should include caption, not name. (bug #314402, Review 108959)
Please explain the meaning of vsync in the config gui (bug #314998)
kwin crash when clicking kickoff widget ("K menu") (bug #315951)
Dual screen issue caused by d6b3f6983efebc42abd6028ece9c3ec7facea2d0 (bug #316040)
Description text for the Slide Back effect is incorrect (bug #316877)
Java Swing Apps do not receive Deiconify event if window is shaded (bug #317025, Review 109593)
Snapping: Can no longer move window to occupy full screen width (bug #317845, Review 109864)
when using flip switch to switch virtual desktop, activating hot corner trigger becomes difficult (bug #318294, Review 110013)
Mouse action support for sending window to different activity (bug #305758)
'Slide back' effect should react on stacking order changes (bug #294490)
Track mouse effect generates graphics artifacts (bug #304435)
vertical maximization doesn't work as expected (bug #91703, Review 103948)
Slide Back: Sometimes the Inactive window pops to the font for apprx. one frame when it is activated. (bug #294865)
Port Task Manager applets to QML
Replace krandr KCM by libkscreen-based one
KActivities/SLC support for most our applications
Rework and optimize vertex buffer object handling, vertex uploading, and the window and decoration painting code
Add support for creating an OpenGL 3.1 core context
Support for detecting GPU resets, and restarting the compositor
Order and group tasks by activity
Ability to sort entries in the sub-menus (bug #108419)
Add button to notifications that allow configuring them
Improve situtation with multiple batteries (show battery names, dont just sum up _all_ the percentages etc)
Implement notifications for non-internal batteries (aka "Your mouse is running low")
Remember action settings when action is disabled
Allow to keep items in clipboard history
Add search query (based on code from libplasmaweather)
Allow to sort search results by relevance score
Fixes for legacy screensaver that are too invasive for bugfix releases
